pullrequest.title: Model Editor: Undo inserting / deleting model plugins

content.raw:
oh I see. So if we know the event is coming from `MEUserCmdManager` then don't create the new command in ModelCreator right? 

Would this work: Use a flag in `MEUserCmdManager`'s `Undo()` / `Redo()` functions to indicate that undo/redo is in progress and in `ModelCreator`'s callback function check and see if `MEUserCmdManager`'s flag is set before the `NewCmd` call?
content.html:
oh I see. So if we know the event is coming from MEUserCmdManager then don't create the new command in ModelCreator right?

Would this work: Use a flag in MEUserCmdManager's Undo() / Redo() functions to indicate that undo/redo is in progress and in ModelCreator's callback function check and see if MEUserCmdManager's flag is set before the NewCmd call?
